checkPersonID: select count(UserID) from  MagniFoodSchema.Person where UserID Like'%{0}%';
checkCustomer: select count(UserID) from  MagniFoodSchema.Customer where CustomerID Like'%{0}%';
checkCustomerPassword: select count(UserID) from  MagniFoodSchema.Customer where UserID Like'%{0}%' AND CustomerPassword Like '%{1}%' AND CustomerStatus Like '%{2}%';
checkCafeteriaManager: select count(CafeteriaManagerID) from  MagniFoodSchema.CafeteriaManager where CafeteriaManagerID Like'%{0}%';
checkCafeteriaManagerPassword: select count(CafeteriaManagerID) from  MagniFoodSchema.CafeteriaManager where CafeteriaManagerID Like'%{0}%' AND CafeteriaManagerPassword Like '%{1}%' AND CafeteriaManagerrStatus Like '%{2}%';
checkCafeteria: select count(CafeteriaVendorID) from MagniFoodSchema.CafeteriaVendor where CafeteriaVendorID Like'%{0}%' and CafeteriaVendorStatus like '%{1}%';
checkCafe: select count(CafeID) from MagniFoodSchema.Cafe where CafeID Like'%{0}%' and CafeStatus like '%{1}%';
checkCafePassword: select count(CafeUserID) from  MagniFoodSchema.CafeUser where CafeUserID Like'%{0}%' AND CafeUserPassword Like '%{1}%' AND CafeUserStatus Like '%{2}%';
checkCafeUser: select count(CafeUserID) from  MagniFoodSchema.CafeUser where CafeUserID Like'%{0}%';
